settings.description: Quickly and easily punch precision bolt holes in flange gaskets with Power Punches. Hollow Punches also ideal for small diameter ring gaskets. Dove-Tail Punches perfect for fabricating interlocking dove-tail joints in flange gaskets. Dead Blow Hammers ideal for use with hole punches. Shot-loaded head reduces rebound and absorbs impact. Balanced feel. Soft face reduces marring and noise.
